preference.name: LDAP_cert_db_path
preference.preference_description: Defines the path to the certificate used for the Security Services connection. The system only checks this preference if the LDAP_use_ssl preference is set to TRUE. Ensure this preference points to a correctly configured certificate database. Otherwise, errors are encountered when configuring the LDAP synchronization tool to use the SSL. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be the full path to the certificate database used for the Security Services connection.
